meanings.sent1: The undergods watched over the small creatures in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The ancient texts spoke of powerful gods and their undergods.
meanings.sent3: The undergods decided to have a picnic in the meadow.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of undergods, wisdom was valued above all else.
meanings.sent5: The undergods' presence filled the temple with a sense of peace.

meanings.definition: A deity subordinate to a higher god.
meanings.sent1: The undergods served the supreme deity faithfully.
meanings.sent2: Legends told of the undergods' loyalty to their master.
meanings.sent3: One undergod accidentally spilled tea on the divine carpet.
meanings.sent4: The undergods' devotion shone brightly in the heavens.
meanings.sent5: The undergods' humility contrasted with the arrogance of the higher god.

meanings.definition: A god of a lower rank or status.
meanings.sent1: The undergods were respected but held less power than the main deity.
meanings.sent2: The undergods' duties included tending to the sacred garden.
meanings.sent3: A mischievous undergod played pranks on the other deities.
meanings.sent4: The undergods' realm existed beneath the gaze of the supreme god.
meanings.sent5: The undergods' presence brought a sense of balance to the divine hierarchy.
